titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 150th anniversary of Bowie State University.
A resolution recognizing the 150th anniversary of Bowie State University.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates Bowie State University, located in Bowie, Maryland, on the 150th anniversary of its founding.
